book.title: The Potala Holy Palace in the Snow Land

authors.author: Tibetan Administrative Office of the Potala

book.annotation: Published as a result of the Potala Palace in Lhasa being placed on the World Heritage List. Date of publiction of this book is not listed so it may be earlier that 2005. 194 pages on coated stock. Filled with beautiful four color photos. In English and Tibetan (?) with some Chinese characters on title verso.
